1.16.5.0.0.2: Fixed the clientside instance of player's held item not updating after switching to other hotbar items.

1.17.1.0.0.2: Fixed the clientside instance of player's held item not updating after switching to other hotbar items.

1.18.0.0.3: Updated to MC 1.18. Added Brazilian Portuguese translation.

1.19.0.0.4: Update to work with Forge 41.0.64 and above. Fix a NoClassDefFound error. Added Chinese (Simplified) translations. Thank you Wudji.

1.20.0.0.5: Allow all items for a specific modid to be displayed if the '*' wildcard is used. E.g. modid:*
